ComicInfo.Title: Who Shall Be Worthy?
ComicInfo.Summary: Who Shall Be Worthy?: In the year 2537, Loki and Tyrus search for Thor's hammer which has been lost for centuries. It is found by Dargo who uses it to free his people from the evil Corporation and then releases the hammer to return to its true owner.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:19. [Issue ID 43492]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: a Thor of the future),Loki,Tyrus the Terrible,Salla (Dargo's love interest),Dargo Ktor (first appearance,Thor,the Chairman of the Corporation
